attributes.action: Allow the freedom to travel to Spanish islands without returning quarantine
attributes.additional_details: The islands are 1000 miles away from Spain, with Covid cases in single figures. It makes no sense to self isolate people when travel is permitted. This will have a huge impact on travel and return employment.
attributes.background: Whilst it is safe to travel to the Spanish islands, as deemed by the FCO, remove the restriction to quarantine for 14 days upon return.
